front.title: IEEE 802 Nendica Report: Intelligent Lossless Data Center Networks

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This paper is the result of a work item [19] within the IEEE 802 “Network Enhancements for the Next Decade” Industry Connections Activity known as Nendica. The paper extends a previous report, “IEEE 802 Nendica Report: The Lossless Network for Data Centers” [20] published on August 17, 2018. This update provides additional background on evolving use cases in modern data centers and proposes solutions to additional problems identified by this report.
